summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and special handling fees, and provides a summary of the shipment's details, including the payer and delivery information.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the FedEx services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Drop-off
events.description: A shipment was dropped off at FedEx for delivery, which is detailed in the invoice.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Delivery
events.description: The shipment was delivered on August 13, 2004, as noted in the shipment detail.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
49 Zomo Ranch Rd, Stanley, HM87056, US
6100 Red Hook Maier B3, St Thomas, 00802-1348, VI
keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 23, 2004, and is for a total amount of $41.77.
The shipment was dropped off on August 12, 2004, and delivered on August 13, 2004.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge of 7.00% applied to the shipment.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the payer for the shipment, which was billed to his account.
The invoice indicates a discount of $1.21 applied to the total charges.
